message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value, I propose a price of $95 for it. I understand its worth to you is $80, but this offer includes exclusive access to our customer support and future updates. Please let me know if you're interested.
I'm interested in the product, but $95 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $85 for it, considering its value to me is $80. I'd appreciate it if you could consider my offer.
